nodes.text: The Nilrebmah system was a small star system in the Expansion Region which contained twelve uninhabited planets.

Towards the end of the Subterra Period, before the Second Great Schism, the fallen Jedi Ku'ar Danar conducted an experiment in the system following his corruption on Korriban. After subjugating the civilization of the moons of Nilrebmah II, he obliged the population to build a gigantic monolith on Nilrebmah XIII using living, Force-sensitive stones from Nilrebmah X. Within his new tower, Danar's experiment succeeded as he managed to move the entire planet from its orbit with only he Force and move it into a lunar orbit over Nilrebmah XII, sacrificing all life, including himself, in the process.
